code: import React,{useEffect}from'react';import{useDrop}from'react-dnd';import socket from'./socket';import Icon from'./Icon';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BattleMap=_ref=>{let{mapImage,icons,setIcons}=_ref;const room=window.location.pathname.split("/").pop();const[,drop]=useDrop({accept:'ICON',drop:(item,monitor)=>{const delta=monitor.getDifferenceFromInitialOffset();if(!delta)return;const newLeft=Math.round(item.left+delta.x);const newTop=Math.round(item.top+delta.y);setIcons(prev=>prev.map(icon=>icon.id===item.id?{...icon,left:newLeft,top:newTop}:icon));socket.emit("moveIcon",{room,iconId:item.id,newPosition:{left:newLeft,top:newTop}});}});useEffect(()=>{const handleIconMoved=_ref2=>{let{iconId,newPosition}=_ref2;setIcons(prev=>prev.map(icon=>icon.id===iconId?{...icon,...newPosition}:icon));};const handleAddIcon=_ref3=>{let{icon}=_ref3;setIcons(prev=>[...prev,icon]);};socket.on("iconMoved",handleIconMoved);socket.on("addIcon",handleAddIcon);return()=>{socket.off("iconMoved",handleIconMoved);socket.off("addIcon",handleAddIcon);};},[setIcons]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{ref:drop,style:{position:'relative',width:'100%',height:'100%',overflow:'hidden'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:mapImage,alt:"Battle Map",style:{width:'100%',height:'100%',objectFit:'contain',display:'block'}}),icons.map(icon=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Icon,{icon:icon},icon.id))]});};export default BattleMap;
